text:
Council of Law Reporting Order 2013

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following order under section 5(4) of the Council of Law Reporting Act 1990 .

18 November 2013

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

BRIAN WIGHTMAN

Minister for Justice

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Council of Law Reporting Order 2013 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Principal Act
    In this order, the Council of Law Reporting Act 1990 is referred to as the Principal Act.

4.
    The amendment effected by this clause has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Council of Law Reporting Act 1990 .

5.
    The amendment effected by this clause has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Council of Law Reporting Act 1990 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 27 November 2013

This order is administered in the Department of Justice.
